alert.note: Alert for North Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 1:34PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Cass County through 200 PM CDT... At 134 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Walker, to near Hackensack, to near Nevis, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hackensack around 140 PM CDT. Longville and Woman Lake around 200 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Whipholt, Pheasant Lake, Brevik, Pontoria, Webb Lake, Ten Mile Lake and Big Portage Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
